name: Hyeonjun Kim
body:
![](profile2.jpg) ###Profile *B.S. in Computer Science from PNU(Pusan National University) (Feb 2017)
*Exchange student experience from State University of New York Oswego
*Private language institute experience from Oxford,UK
###Links
Email: bright20136 at google.com // bright2013 at icloud.com
Github: github.com/kimmikimmi
Facebook: Click here
Personal server: cs.oswego.edu/~hkim24
Personal FileSystem : cs.oswego.edu/~hkim24/documents
Baekjoon account:(ACM) bright2013
###Interests Current Computer Algorithm, Google Firebase, NodeJS, OpenCV, C++14, Functional Paradigm Old Android development, Discrete Mathematics, JavaScript, Computer Security, Embedded system(IoT), Machine learning ###Skills Programming: C, C++14, Java, node.js, PHP Human Languages: English-Advanced, Korean - Native ###Development Experience Game development : RPG game with (libgdx + overlap 2d) with github.com/rators Concurrent programming : Registration system - Multi-threading, Java Concurrent Queue, and testing. Embedded programming(IoT) : Robot pet with some emotions (Cortex M3 + microC OS -3 ) Clocks emitting perfume - (Arduino, Android) Android development : Simple game "one to fifty" Graduation project : Fire detection system (NodeJS, Firebase, OpenCV, Arduino, Android) Algorithm : solving problems at acmicpc.com (baekjoon Online judge) ###Campus Activities "Coala(Code + Algorithm + Life) Movement" - Programming Club on Campus "JigumHoe(지검회)" - Kendo club on Campus ###Work Experience Software Engineer, developing simulation program with department of industrial engineering by prof.Kaphwan Kim ###Awards - 소외된 90%를 위한 창의설계 경진대회(주최 : 미래창조과학부) 동상 (팀명 : 향기를 듣다) - 부산대학교 LINC 사업단 동남권 융복합 프로젝트 입상 ![](donga.png) ###Project links
